content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to the power network and has no input liquid. The boiler is out of fuel.

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of a lab (position -17.5, 23.5) which currently has 15 automation science packs inserted but requires 10 more to start research.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the positions of the entities you are trying to connect with pipes are correctly aligned and that there are no obstacles in between. Check the coordinates carefully before attempting to connect.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the intended position.

### Errors related to power connections
- Verify that all power connections are properly established. If an entity is not receiving power, check the connections and ensure that they are linked to a power source.
